attributes.title: Please please I beg you, don’t get this app
attributes.review:
This is most definitely the worst app I have ever in my life gotten. The app started off working fine. But as time went on.. the app got worse. It made my phone start to glitch a lot. The app would always crash and kick me out. The app would also track a lot of things that I did. It feels like a total invasion of privacy if you ask me.
Just don’t get this app. Trust me.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: i had the worst experience with this app. it brought a virus into my phone and every time i turned it on, the ghost busters theme song played. it drove me crazy. i had to put my phone under bleach, ketchup, dish soap, vomit, mayonnaise, spit, oxi clean stain remover, head & shoulders shampoo and conditioner 2 in 1 (old spice flavor), etc. and in the end it didn’t work. i had to buy a new phone but it was also cursed. i will never forget that experience.

attributes.title: 0/10 would not recommend
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to ✨b a s k ✨ in the presidential 🧚🏾✨glory🧚🏾✨ but it brainwashed me 🧠 into punting my cat 🐈 into a 7/11! Then the trump administration came and 👀 dog walked 🦮 my goldfish crackers 🐟 off the side of the doctors  🥼 office that my recently-punted cat  🐱 went to so it could get de-punted 😔 Then my screen 📺 got spammed with gIANT Cheetos that looked 👁 like they were raised by ants 🐜 and they told me to vote trump 2020 or else they would set my hair on fire 🔥... anyone have an extra wig? 🙈

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: I thought I knew what bad quality was, but this app really showed me the true definition of that term. When u say bad I mean it’s just over all slow , lagging , and I just don’t see the point of it what so ever. I got bugs on my device also so that’s even more points cut off. I hope that this app is shut down very soon. And on a side note, what is this apps purpose in the first place? I don’t get it

attributes.title: trash 🤢🗑✨
attributes.review:
this app is absolutely terrible. i opened it up and a random number texted me saying they were calling ice on me and i’m not even illegal. i also saw the worse thing ever. i couldn’t even tell what it was. i just want you to know not to open it around kids, or anyone for that matter, you’ll be traumatized. i’ve been sleeping with holy water hoping it’ll make the nightmares go away. every time i close my eyes i see the same 🍊face. please for the love of god, don’t get it. it’s not worth it 😭

oh and also he’s trash 🗑 ✨and just an awful human being who treats everyone but his supporters trash. i’m surprised he even has women supporting him, hunny shut up, he doesn’t even respect you.

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrendous
attributes.review: This app made my phone overheat and turn off immediately after downloading!! And when opening the app, thousands of disgusting pornographic images popped up on my phone and wouldn’t go away!!!! My children are scared and want answers for why such an app is available on the app store! I now have 27 viruses and am being forced to purchase a new phone because of this terrible application.

attributes.userName: Rest in peace Little Gold fish
attributes.title: It made me sacrifice my gold fish
attributes.review:
It made my phone crazy!! 
I downloaded this app and it literally out of nowhere said “GIVE ME YOUR GOLDFISH” and I got super scared because this Cheeto man was talking about my sweet little gold fish!! Obviously I said no, but this app deceived me and tricked me into becoming a Cheeto man follower. I sacrificed everything to be accepted, but then he said “ALL LIVES MATTER” and that was the last thing said, before sacrificing my sweet gold fish.......... 

Rest In Peace  little gold fish🕊

attributes.title: Dump Trump 2020
attributes.review: This app is the worst thing ever. First off it took weeks to download. Then when I opened the app it asked if I would tell them where I live and my social security number. All I wanted to do was support our orange king 😩 Then the day after I got the app oranges came Stampeding in my house! Then they all form into trump and asked to vote for him! At that point I didn’t know what to do so I ate one... my worst nightmare happened after that 😿

attributes.title: DISGUSTANG😡😡🤮🤮🤬🤢
attributes.review: as soon as i opened this app, i was forced to watch disgusting videos of a hideous orange monster!! it mentally scarred me and my children!! he was spewing hatred and encouraging violence, and was overall a terrible influence. those videos should come with a warning, and i was unable to stop them as soon as they started playing!! also,,, the app released a virus on my phone, causing it to explode!! i could have died!!😡😡😡 this app is a hazard to public health😡🤬

attributes.title: if i could give it zero stars i would.
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch to another dimension and caused my sunflower seed to grow inside of my house. my shoe walked over to me and crawled in the pillow case. so not cool! the app is the cause of this. then despacito started playing on full volume on my motorcycle truck and my unborn newborn daughter (i’m a dog btw) started to cry. yes i can no i didn’t app caused such a mess in my life that won’t be able to be fixed. DELETE IT.
